Trigger.name: Waterfall

regexCodeList.string: ^(You) bring down a deluge upon (.+), \w+ clumsy attempts to evade your retribution not availing \w+\.$
^The amorphous form of (\w+) roils as a huge deluge of water and ice hammers down upon (.+), \w+ clumsy attempts to jump back from \w+ oncoming fate not availing \w+ at all\.
^You bring down a deluge upon (.+), but \w+ leaps back out of the range, suffering little more than a faceful of icy spray\.$
^The amorphous form of (\w+) roils as a huge deluge of ice and water falls towards (.+), but \w+ leaps back out of range, suffering little more than a faceful of icy spray\.$
^The amorphous form of (\w+) roils as a huge deluge of water and ice hammers down upon the sluggish and unresponsive form of (.+)\.$
^(You) bring down a deluge upon (.+), \w+ sluggish and unresponsive form having no hope of evading your retribution\.$
